forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to afternoon sunshine. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness after midnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear early followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain later in the day. Increasing winds. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain later in the day. Increasing winds. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 54F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
